Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Galleon
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A large, multi-decked sailing ship primarily designed for transporting goods over long distances across oceans. It features a sturdy hull with ample cargo hold space, multiple masts rigged with square sails for propulsion, and a high stern and forecastle for additional cargo storage and crew quarters.\n\n<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Helmsman x1, Boatswain x1, Passenger x4
